attributes.action: stop all MP's and members of the Lords using the term Brit it is very offensive
attributes.background: in the 70's the ira used the term brit it was kill the brits or another good brit when one of the lads was killed.the pakistani's were offended by the term paki so it was classed as offensive. such as calling japaneese japs or americans yanks give us who served in Ireland the same respect as others

rejection.details: You could start a new petition calling for the rules in the House of Commons to be changed, so that MPs speaking in the House of Commons are not allowed to use the term "Brit".
